item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Kurt Elling Albums in FLAC
item.description:
Hello my dear music friends,

I keep my fingers crossed hoping some of you will have the following albums available,

Nightmoves
The Questions
SuperBlue

Thanks a million !
